About Me

Dynamic and results-driven professional with expertise in software engineering, data analysis, and user-centered design. Proficient in TypeScript, Python, and scalable system development, with a track record of delivering innovative solutions in Agile environments. Skilled in crafting intuitive, secure, and efficient systems, from interactive web applications to real-time distributed platforms. Passionate about leveraging technical skills and cross-functional collaboration to drive impactful digital transformations.
